parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name>game1</name>=<value>  arma3

</value></part><part><name>version1</name>=<value> 1.56

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> LeaderBoards

</value></part><part><name>descr</name>=<value>  Requests given leaderboard to download values around the user position in the table.

</value></part><part><name>s1</name>=<value> [[leaderboardRequestRowsGlobalAroundUser]] [leaderboard, offset, rows]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> leaderboard: [[String]] - Name of the leaderboard

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> offset: [[Number]] - Offset from user position.

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> rows: [[Number]] - Defines how many rows are requested

</value></part><part><name>r1</name>=<value> [[Boolean]] - Returns [[true]] if request has been started

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_isGettingValues = [[leaderboardRequestRowsGlobalAroundUser]] ["TT01", -5, 10];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[leaderboardGetRows]],[[leaderboardInit]],[[leaderboardRequestRowsFriends]],[[leaderboardRequestRowsGlobal]],[[leaderboardsRequestUploadScore]],[[leaderboardsRequestUploadScoreKeepBest]],[[leaderboardState]]
</value></part></template></root>
